https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eJ4GUj6NjSGFhMpnuVcdTV0GqP0.jpg Affected tells the story of a small business owner that lost over 90% of his revenue after Covid-19 hit America. With frustration, he decided to embark on a journey to document the lives of all the others that have been impacted by Covid. Affected: The Story of US
